examples:

Refund request reason: I do not want the subscription and would like my account cancelled and my money back. 
I simply forgot to end the trial-period. 
Thank you

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good afternoon! Please return the money, because I am not using your application. I had a trial period, but even during the trial period, I did not use this application. And accordingly, I completely forgot that I signed up for a subscription.
What kind of problem ?: Other Explain your problem: My card was charged because I canceled the subscription after the trial period, but I did not use it after the trial period. Can I get a refund?

What is the problem related to ?: Canva Pro Describe your problem: Hello, I would like to ask for help, as I missed my subscription and I only wanted to use the trial period. I thought the subscription will automatically turn off after the end of the trial period. I just received an invoice for purchasing a CanvaPro subscription. Would there be a chance to cancel my subscription and request a refund? Please consider my request positively. Pheasant heat Anna Stachecka
What do you need help with?: I did not want to continue the subscription and wanted to cancel during trial period. Please cancel are refund charge. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't use Canva Pro during the trial period and will not be using it. My subcription ended yesterday.
Because I failed to cancel the subscription during the free trial period and caused payment, but I don’t need to use Canva, I asked for a refund. Please understand! Must be refunded!
Because I failed to cancel the subscription during the free trial period and caused payment, but I don’t need to use Canva, I asked for a refund. Please understand! Must be refunded!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Good evening,

I received an unfamiliar charge from Canva. The reason might have been that I signed up for a trial period, which I later decided to not continue with your services. However, I did not receive any warning email before the trial period ended which resulted in me forgetting cancellation. Although, this account is not even email confirmed. 

Your services are great, but we wish to not continue and would like to get a refund. I immediately cancelled the plan as well.

Would love to hear from you soon! And thank you for your time. 

Kindest regards, 
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I subscribed for the trial, and a few days later I canceled the subscription. Now you have charged me anyways on Dec 7, 2020. I demand a refund, because I had a trial period, in which I could cancel, and I did. Please inform me about the procedure of the refund. Thank you very much in advance!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, I never subscribed to a yearly account.  As you can see, I don’t have any activity on this website during this subscription period as I do not use Canva frequently to have needed a subscription.  Please refund me the total amount of $119.40, as I really cannot afford this right now.  I have not used any of the Pro features during this subscription period.  I am reaching out a few days after I was charged because I was busy with midterms and did not get a chance to request for a payment refund.

Refund request reason: Accidentally let trial period extend to charge.  We will not be using Canva Pro at this time.  Please consider sending refund.  Thank you so much and have a wonderful day.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hi, I entered the payment details during the trial period but I forgot to unsubscribe and an automatic payment started, I kindly ask you if I can be refunded. Thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I’m so sorry but I will not be needing this service and I intended to cancel before the trial period expired. It totally slipped my mind until I received an email early this morning. Please refund in full... I have not logged in since the trial period ended. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I cancelled my subscription after the trial period and I was still charged for 4 months.  This account has been inactive for that entire period of time and I would like to request a refund and to cancel this account please.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The free trial period ended today, January 10, 2021. The funds were immediately debited from the account. After the trial period, I did not want and will not use the paid version of canva. In this regard, I ask you to return the money to me.

Nr faktury: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello.

I would like to request a refund for extending my Canva Pro trial period. The trial period was satisfactory for me and helped to finish some projects, but I can't use Canva any longer because I had my fourth child in December and I don't have time to work. In all the confusion, I missed the end-of-trial reminder email and did not cancel my subscription. I am asking for your understanding and refund.

Greetings ,
Monika Uba
How can we help you ?: Welcome! Today my free trial period on the Canva side has expired and I forgot to cancel my subscription. Is it possible to refund the annual fee paid? Greetings: László <NAME>

Refund request reason: Hello, I would like to request a refund because I didn't use the Canva during the subscription period that was automatically charged after the free trial...I also didn't use Canva Pro for the free trial either.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Not warned about the end of the trial period, it is not suitable for use. You can see in the trial period only one used it, on the day of registration. Thank you

I am unable to pay for the service which I did not use, if you check my usage history, there will be no activity during this period. Thank you very much in advance

Refund request reason: Will not be using pro services.

Refund request reason: Hello! Tried canceling the trial period before the last day, but had internet issues. I'd like to cancel this and get a full refund. Thank you!

Refund request reason: It s my fault but I forgot to cancel the subscription after the trial month period. As you can see, I have never used it past that period as this is not the perfect solution for me. Please as of good will I would be very grateful I f I could get a refund. Thank you very much
Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, I forgot to cancel my subscription after my trial period knowing that I do not need Canva pro tools. Is it possible to get a refund please?

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, Due to a big mistake on my part, I have decided to cancel my canva pro subscription. I am not questioning the services you offer, but being a student, I cannot afford to continue paying. So I only took advantage of my trial period by forgetting to cancel my subscription when the free period expired. I hope so, to be eligible for a refund. By thanking you for your return, Sincerely, Harouchi Sonia.

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: I want to end the trial period on Canva Pro, but can not figure out how to do it. Does not show my subscription until the trial period is over? The trial period is over 10.02.21 and I want to finish it before that time.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello Canva Team,

Hope you are well. I would like to request a refund for the recent charge for the subscription on my account. I have already cancelled the subscription, but I had accidentally not cancelled the free trial prior to it automatically changing into a paid service. Unfortunately, I cannot maintain paying for this service during this period of time. If the charge can be reversed, that would be greatly appreciated.

Refund request reason: I signed up for a free trial of canva pro but I don't really use it. I forgot to cancel during  the trial period and was charged the yearly subscription.
What kind of problem did you have? : Canva Pro Problem Description: I canceled auto-renewal during the trial period, but I am being billed.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I activated a free trial and forgot. There were no warnings about the end of the trial period. Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Cancellation within the free trial period, but the charge on the card was launched, unfortunately I have no way to continue the subscription even though it contributed a lot.

I would therefore like to ask you for a refund because it was not my intention to renew the subscription. Thank you for your availability.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I signed up for the free version and stayed on automatic billing. Unfortunately I forgot to cancel the trial period and was charged on that first day. I would appreciate it if they could make the refund.
